topic.title: Clinical Office Visit Summary - conformance rules

lines.i: Objective : 170.314(e)(1) (View, download, and transmit to 3rd party) for EP

ol.li: SHALL conform to General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
Contains exactly one [1..1] socialHistorySection with data type SocialHistorySection
Contains exactly one [1..1] problemSection with data type ProblemSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] medicationsSection with data type MedicationsSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] hospitalAdmissionMedicationsSectionEntriesOptional with data type HospitalAdmissionMedicationsSectionEntriesOptional
Contains zero or one [0..1] hospitalDischargeMedicationsSection with data type HospitalDischargeMedicationsSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] allergiesSection with data type AllergiesSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] allergiesSectionEntriesOptional with data type AllergiesSectionEntriesOptional
Contains exactly one [1..1] resultsSection with data type ResultsSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] vitalSignsSection with data type VitalSignsSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] vitalSignsSectionEntriesOptional with data type VitalSignsSectionEntriesOptional
Contains exactly one [1..1] planOfCareSection with data type PlanOfCareSection
Contains exactly one [1..1] proceduresSection with data type ProceduresSection
Contains exactly one [1..1] immunizationsSection with data type ImmunizationsSection
Contains exactly one [1..1] medicationsAdministeredSection with data type MedicationsAdministeredSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] reasonForVisitSection with data type ReasonForVisitSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] chiefComplaintSection with data type ChiefComplaintSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] chiefComplaintAndReasonForVisitSection with data type ChiefComplaintAndReasonForVisitSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] assessmentAndPlanSection with data type AssessmentAndPlanSection

Contains exactly one [1..1] instructionsSection with data type InstructionsSection
Instructions Section will satisfy the following MU2 elements : - Clinical instructions - Recommended patient decision aids (if applicable to the visit)
Contains zero or one [0..1] interventionsSection with data type InterventionsSection

Contains exactly one [1..1] hospitalDischargeInstructionsSection with data type HospitalDischargeInstructionsSection
Instructions Section will satisfy the following MU2 elements : - Inpatient Setting Only: Discharge instructions
Contains zero or one [0..1] assessmentSection with data type AssessmentSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] hospitalAdmissionDiagnosisSection with data type HospitalAdmissionDiagnosisSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] hospitalDischargeDiagnosisSection with data type HospitalDischargeDiagnosisSection
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] encountersSection with data type EncountersSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] postoperativeDiagnosisSection with data type PostoperativeDiagnosisSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] postprocedureDiagnosisSection with data type PostprocedureDiagnosisSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] historyOfPastIllnessSection with data type HistoryOfPastIllnessSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] preoperativeDiagnosisSection with data type PreoperativeDiagnosisSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] reasonForReferralSection with data type ReasonForReferralSection
SHALL satisfy: cannotHaveChiefComplaintAndReasonForVisitWithChiefComplaintSectionOrReasonSection (CONF:10055)

SHALL have one of Assessment (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.8) or Assessment and Plan (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.9) or Hospital Admission Diagnosis (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.43) or Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24) or Postoperative Diagnosis (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.35) or Postprocedure Diagnosis (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.36) or Encounters (entries required: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1) or Problem (entries required: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1)
SHALL satisfy: canHaveEitherRequiredOrOptionalVitalSignsSection
SHALL satisfy: medicationListConstraint
SHALL satisfy: problemEntry
SHALL conform to General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId with data type Infrastructure Root Type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type II
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type CE
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime with data type TS
Contains exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode with data type CE
Contains exactly one [1..1] socialHistorySection with data type SocialHistorySection
Contains exactly one [1..1] problemSection with data type ProblemSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] medicationsSection with data type MedicationsSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] hospitalAdmissionMedicationsSectionEntriesOptional with data type HospitalAdmissionMedicationsSectionEntriesOptional
Contains zero or one [0..1] hospitalDischargeMedicationsSection with data type HospitalDischargeMedicationsSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] allergiesSection with data type AllergiesSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] allergiesSectionEntriesOptional with data type AllergiesSectionEntriesOptional
Contains exactly one [1..1] resultsSection with data type ResultsSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] vitalSignsSection with data type VitalSignsSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] vitalSignsSectionEntriesOptional with data type VitalSignsSectionEntriesOptional
Contains exactly one [1..1] planOfCareSection with data type PlanOfCareSection
Contains exactly one [1..1] proceduresSection with data type ProceduresSection
Contains exactly one [1..1] immunizationsSection with data type ImmunizationsSection
Contains exactly one [1..1] medicationsAdministeredSection with data type MedicationsAdministeredSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] reasonForVisitSection with data type ReasonForVisitSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] chiefComplaintSection with data type ChiefComplaintSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] chiefComplaintAndReasonForVisitSection with data type ChiefComplaintAndReasonForVisitSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] assessmentAndPlanSection with data type AssessmentAndPlanSection

Contains exactly one [1..1] instructionsSection with data type InstructionsSection
Instructions Section will satisfy the following MU2 elements : - Clinical instructions - Recommended patient decision aids (if applicable to the visit)
Contains zero or one [0..1] interventionsSection with data type InterventionsSection

Contains exactly one [1..1] hospitalDischargeInstructionsSection with data type HospitalDischargeInstructionsSection
Instructions Section will satisfy the following MU2 elements : - Inpatient Setting Only: Discharge instructions
Contains zero or one [0..1] assessmentSection with data type AssessmentSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] hospitalAdmissionDiagnosisSection with data type HospitalAdmissionDiagnosisSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] hospitalDischargeDiagnosisSection with data type HospitalDischargeDiagnosisSection
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] encountersSection with data type EncountersSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] postoperativeDiagnosisSection with data type PostoperativeDiagnosisSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] postprocedureDiagnosisSection with data type PostprocedureDiagnosisSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] historyOfPastIllnessSection with data type HistoryOfPastIllnessSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] preoperativeDiagnosisSection with data type PreoperativeDiagnosisSection
Contains zero or one [0..1] reasonForReferralSection with data type ReasonForReferralSection

Contains at least one [1..*] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] Author

Contains exactly one [1..1] custodian, where its type is Custodian
Contains exactly one [1..1] Custodian

Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2
Contains exactly one [1..1] Component2

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget
Such recordTargets SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole
This patientRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient
This patient Contains exactly one [1..1] name
This patient Contains exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode
This patient Contains exactly one [1..1] ethnicGroupCode
This patient Contains exactly one [1..1] raceCode
This patient SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCommunication
This languageCommunication Contains exactly one [1..1] languageCode
This patient Contains exactly one [1..1] birthTime

Contains zero or more [0..*] documentationOf
Such documentationOfs Contains exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent
This serviceEvent Contains at least one [1..*] performer
Such performers Contains exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is CDA Assigned Entity
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Assigned Entity

Contains zero or one [0..1] componentOf
This componentOf Contains exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter, where its type is CDA Encompassing Encounter
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Encompassing Encounter
SHALL satisfy: cannotHaveChiefComplaintAndReasonForVisitWithChiefComplaintSectionOrReasonSection (CONF:10055)

SHALL have one of Assessment (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.8) or Assessment and Plan (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.9) or Hospital Admission Diagnosis (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.43) or Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24) or Postoperative Diagnosis (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.35) or Postprocedure Diagnosis (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.36) or Encounters (entries required: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22.1) or Problem (entries required: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1)
SHALL satisfy: canHaveEitherRequiredOrOptionalVitalSignsSection
SHALL satisfy: medicationListConstraint
SHALL satisfy: problemEntry

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.11.11.11.1.5"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1681966840"/> <code code="719192204"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <effectiveTime/> <confidentialityCode code="1267694698"/> <recordTarget> <patientRole/> </recordTarget> <author> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <custodian/> <component/> </ClinicalDocument>
